# google\_compute\_regions

Provides access to available Google Compute regions for a given project.
See more about [regions and zones](https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/regions-zones/) in the upstream docs.

```python
import constructs as constructs
import cdktf as cdktf
# Provider bindings are generated by running cdktf get.
# See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
import ...gen.providers.google as google
class MyConvertedCode(cdktf.TerraformStack):
    def __init__(self, scope, name):
        super().__init__(scope, name)
        data_google_compute_regions_available =
        google.data_google_compute_regions.DataGoogleComputeRegions(self, "available")
        # In most cases loops should be handled in the programming language context and
        #     not inside of the Terraform context. If you are looping over something external, e.g. a variable or a file input
        #     you should consider using a for loop. If you are looping over something only known to Terraform, e.g. a result of a data source
        #     you need to keep this like it is.
        google_compute_subnetwork_cluster_count = cdktf.TerraformCount.of(
            cdktf.Fn.length_of(data_google_compute_regions_available.names))
        google.compute_subnetwork.ComputeSubnetwork(self, "cluster",
            ip_cidr_range="10.36.${" + google_compute_subnetwork_cluster_count.index + "}.0/24",
            name="my-network",
            network="my-network",
            region=cdktf.Token.as_string(
                cdktf.property_access(data_google_compute_regions_available.names, [google_compute_subnetwork_cluster_count.index
                ])),
            count=google_compute_subnetwork_cluster_count
        )
```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are supported:

* `project` (Optional) - Project from which to list available regions. Defaults to project declared in the provider.
* `status` (Optional) - Allows to filter list of regions based on their current status. Status can be either `UP` or `DOWN`.
  Defaults to no filtering (all available regions - both `UP` and `DOWN`).

## Attributes Reference

The following attribute is exported:

* `names` - A list of regions available in the given project
